uk.ac.susx.mlcl.lib.tasks
Interface Task

All Superinterfaces:
ExceptionTrapping, PropertyCarrying, Runnable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCommandTask, AbstractExternalSortCommand, AbstractParallelCommandTask, AbstractParallelTask, AbstractTask, CountTask, ExternalCountCommand, ExternalKnnSimsCommand, ExternalSortEntriesCommand, ExternalSortEventsCommand, ExternalSortInstancesCommand, FileCopyTask, FileDeleteTask, FileMoveTask, InvertedApssTask, NaiveApssTask, ObjectMergeTask, ObjectPipeTask, ObjectSortTask, ThreadedApssTask
public interface Task
extends Runnable, PropertyCarrying, ExceptionTrapping

Define a common interface for worker objects. Essentially this class is Runnable which also supports exception trapping and the ability to set arbitrary properties on it.i

Author:
Hamish I A Morgan <hamish.morgan@sussex.ac.uk>
